section.title: carrierroute.use_domain
section.para: When using tree lookup per user, this parameter specifies whether to use the domain part for user matching or not..

section.title: carrierroute.fallback_default
section.para: If the user has a non-existing tree set and fallback_default is set to 1, the default tree is used. Else error is returned.

section.title: carrierroute.fetch_rows
section.para: The number of the rows to be fetched at once from database when loading the routing data..
